solution_line_template: The pancakes were ${pancake_cost_per_stack} a stack and they sold {num_pancake_stacks_sold} stacks for a total of {pancake_cost_per_stack}*{num_pancake_stacks_sold} = $<<{pancake_cost_per_stack}*{num_pancake_stacks_sold}={total_pancake_revenue}>>{total_pancake_revenue}

The bacon was ${bacon_cost_per_slice} a slice and they sold {num_bacon_slices_sold} slices for a total of {bacon_cost_per_slice}*{num_bacon_slices_sold} = $<<{bacon_cost_per_slice}*{num_bacon_slices_sold}={total_bacon_revenue}>>{total_bacon_revenue}

They sold ${total_pancake_revenue} in pancakes and ${total_bacon_revenue} in bacon for a total of {total_pancake_revenue}+{total_bacon_revenue} = $<<{total_pancake_revenue}+{total_bacon_revenue}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue}
